description: The Default_unknown_scored dataset is designed to assist in predicting loan defaults by providing a comprehensive set of financial and demographic data. It includes information such as borrower age, income, credit score, and loan details, which are crucial for assessing credit risk. The dataset is particularly useful for financial institutions and data scientists working on credit scoring models, as it contains variables like FICO scores, debt-to-income ratios, and interest rates. Additionally, it includes probabilistic predictions of default, which can be used to evaluate and improve predictive models. The dataset's unique feature is its combination of demographic data, such as age and state, with financial metrics, offering a holistic view of each borrower's profile. This makes it an excellent resource for developing machine learning models aimed at reducing default rates and improving loan approval processes. The inclusion of loan purpose and home ownership status further enriches the dataset, allowing for more nuanced analyses and insights into borrower behavior and risk factors.
shortDesc: Loan default prediction dataset with financial and demographic data.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Unique identifier for each record, integer format.

columns.name: Status
columns.comment: Current status of the loan application, text format.

columns.name: Date_Of_Birth_parsed
columns.comment: Borrower's date of birth, date format.

columns.name: Age
columns.comment: Borrower's age in years, integer format.

columns.name: State
columns.comment: US state of residence, text format.

columns.name: Interest_Rate
columns.comment: Interest rate of the loan, decimal format.

columns.name: FICO_Range
columns.comment: Range of borrower's FICO score, text format.

columns.name: FICO_max
columns.comment: Maximum FICO score in range, integer format.

columns.name: FICO_min
columns.comment: Minimum FICO score in range, integer format.

columns.name: Default
columns.comment: Indicates if loan defaulted, text format.

columns.name: Loan_Purpose
columns.comment: Purpose of the loan, text format.

columns.name: Loan_Length
columns.comment: Length of the loan in months, integer format.

columns.name: Home_Ownership
columns.comment: Borrower's home ownership status, text format.
